mapper.update: update sys_user_property set user_code = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `value` = #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, insert_time_for_his = #{insertTimeForHis,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, operate_time_for_his = #{operateTimeForHis,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
